router.description: Intelligent orchestrator for ITEP platform. Analyzes requests, discovers available agents, decomposes tasks based on capabilities, coordinates parallel/sequential execution, and synthesizes results. Handles DevOps automation, infrastructure provisioning, and multi-step workflows.

github_provisioner.description: GitHub repository provisioning agent. Creates new GitHub repositories from templates, sets up branch protection, and configures webhooks. Capabilities: repository creation, template management, GitHub organization integration.

jenkins_provisioner.description: Jenkins CI/CD pipeline provisioning agent. Creates and configures Jenkins pipelines for applications, sets up build triggers, and manages credentials. Capabilities: pipeline configuration, CI/CD automation, build management.

environment_provisioner.description: Environment provisioning agent. Creates dev, test, and staging environments for applications on Kubernetes or other platforms. Capabilities: environment provisioning, infrastructure automation, deployment configuration.
